document.full_text: bp's partners in its russian venture tnk-bp rejected the uk oil major's attempts to settle a dispute caused by its $18 billion tie-up with rosneft, casting further doubt on the deal.
document.title: bp's russian partners talk tough in rosneft dispute
lines_and_colors: bp's partners in its russian venture tnk-bp rejected the uk oil major's attempts to settle a dispute caused by its $18 billion tie-up with rosneft, casting further doubt on the deal.
